item.title: Meta、微软在人工智能领域的投入开始动摇投资者信心
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，马特-戴总结了 Alphabet、微软和 Meta 公布的最新支出计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 康卡斯特在密集促销周期中减缓互联网和电视业务亏损
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）在互联网价格锁定保证和捆绑计划的帮助下，减缓了第三季度宽带和有线电视用户流失的趋势。【原文：Comcast Corp. slowed the tide of broadband and cable TV customer defections in the third quarter with help from an internet price-lock guarantee and bundled plans.】

item.title: 摩根大通欧洲顶级银行家预测明年将出现 "大并购
item.description: 摩根大通公司的一位高级银行家预测，欧洲大宗交易活动的激增，以及作为雄心勃勃的多元化努力一部分而在中东如雨后春笋般出现的新公司的业务，将在未来几年推动该公司在更广泛地区的业务。【原文：A top JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker predicted that a surge in big-ticket dealmaking activity in Europe and business from new companies mushrooming in the Middle East as part of ambitious diversification efforts will drive the firm’s business in the wider region in coming years.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称，数字欧元试点阶段最快将于 2027 年启动
item.description: 如果各国政府和欧洲议会明年就法律框架达成一致，欧洲中央银行可能会在 2027 年启动数字欧元的试点阶段。【原文：The European Central Bank may launch a pilot phase for the digital euro in 2027, provided national governments and the European Parliament agree on a legal framework next year.】

item.title: 富时罗素、StepStone 首次推出私人资产每日指数
item.description: StepStone Group Inc.和富时罗素（FTSE Russell）首次推出了一系列指数，这些指数将每日提供有关私募投资基金的数据，旨在为这个相对不透明的市场带来更多透明度。【原文：StepStone Group Inc. and FTSE Russell debuted a series of indexes that will churn out daily data on private investment funds, in an effort to bring more transparency to the relatively opaque market.】

item.title: 蓝色能源计划数据中心工厂先用天然气，再用核能
item.description: 蓝色能源全球公司（Blue Energy Global Inc.【原文：Blue Energy Global Inc., a nuclear startup, is planning a power plant in Texas that will supply as much as 1.5 gigawatts of electricity to a new data center, initially using natural gas systems and eventually shifting to small reactors.】

item.title: 为人工智能工具做法律杂活，Legora估值18亿美元
item.description: Legora是一家处理法律杂务的人工智能初创公司，该公司已融资1.5亿美元，估值达18亿美元。【原文：Legora, an artificial intelligence startup tackling legal grunt work, has raised $150 million in funding, valuing the company at $1.8 billion.】

item.title: Monzo 老板 TS Anil 辞职，为谷歌高管让路
item.description: Monzo 银行控股集团有限公司（Monzo Bank Holding Group Ltd.在执掌这家总部位于伦敦的金融科技公司近六年后，首席执行官 TS Anil 将卸任。【原文：Monzo Bank Holding Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer TS Anil will step down after almost six years in charge of the London-based fintech.】

item.title: 红旗警报显示，英国陷入困境的企业增加了 78
item.description: 据商业咨询和破产专家贝格斯-特雷诺（Begbies Traynor）的一份报告称，在过去的一年里，英国陷入财务困境的公司数量激增，该报告呼吁政府提供紧急支持，否则将面临倒闭潮的风险。【原文：The number of UK firms in financial distress has surged over the past year, according to a report by business advisory and insolvency specialist Begbies Traynor, which is calling on the government to offer urgent support or risk a wave of failures.】

item.title: 中东人工智能冠军正从石油巨头处汲取火力
item.description: 中东的石油巨头们正在发挥更直接的作用，利用该地区最古老的资源为新资源的数十亿美元赌注提供资金：人工智能。【原文：Oil giants in the Middle East are taking a more direct role in using the region’s oldest resource to finance a multibillion-dollar bet on a new one: Artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 与荷兰养老金挂钩的热门利率赌注正开始褪色
item.description: 欧洲利率交易商正在冷却今年最受欢迎的赌注之一。【原文：European rates traders are cooling on one of the year’s most popular bets.】

item.title: 苹果公司 1 万亿美元的涨势取决于盈利是否与 iPhone 乐观预期相符
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，苹果公司（Apple Inc.周四收盘后，苹果公司将公布财报，届时投资者将了解这种热情是否值得。【原文：Apple Inc. has been on a tear in the stock market over the past few months, as iPhone optimism powers the shares to record highs. Investors will get a sense of whether that enthusiasm was warranted when it reports earnings after the bell Thursday.】

item.title: 让美国再次拥有核武器的冒险运动
item.description:
一家名为Oklo的硅谷初创公司正在带头利用小型反应堆将核能带回美国。其支持者拥有可能破坏核安全的财富和政治关系。【原文：

A Silicon Valley startup called Oklo is leading the charge to bring nuclear power back to the US with small reactors. Its backers have wealth and political connections that could undermine nuclear safety.

item.title: 油价下跌超过产量增长，中国石油集团利润下降
item.description: 尽管中国石油天然气股份有限公司（Cnooc Ltd. ）努力保持强劲的产量增长，但其第三季度利润还是受到了油价下跌的打击。【原文：Cnooc Ltd.’s third-quarter profits took a hit from lower oil prices despite its efforts to maintain strong production growth.】

item.title: 赞比亚通货膨胀因克瓦查持续上涨而进一步缓解
item.description: 由于克瓦查的持续升值有助于抑制进口成本，赞比亚的年度通货膨胀率放缓至2023年8月以来的最低水平。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation slowed to its lowest level since August 2023, as the sustained appreciation of the kwacha helped curb import costs.】

item.title: 食品供应商王子集团伦敦首次公开募股定价将处于区间底部
item.description: Princes Group Plc 的首次公开募股预计将在市场定价区间的底部定价，这表明在伦敦寻求重振其上市市场的过程中需要谨慎行事。【原文：Princes Group Plc’s initial public offering is expected to price at the bottom of the marketed range, indicating caution as London seeks to revive its listings market.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对减产持谨慎态度引发美国国债收窄跌幅
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）反对连续第三次降息，引发美国国债缩减跌幅。【原文：US Treasuries trimmed losses sparked by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s pushback against a third consecutive interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 英国贷款机构 Shawbrook 在伦敦首秀股价上涨
item.description: 肖布鲁克集团公司（Shawbrook Group Plc）在伦敦首次公开发行股票后股价上涨，这是四年来英国最大的本地公司首次公开发行股票。【原文：Shawbrook Group Plc shares advanced in their London debut after the UK’s largest initial public offering by a local firm in four years.】

item.title: 南非将启动 1.35 亿美元基金解决失业问题
item.description: 南非将于周五开始从旨在支持小企业的 25 亿兰特（1.35 亿美元）青年基金中提供贷款，这是政府为解决世界上失业率最高的国家之一的问题而采取的举措之一。【原文：South Africa will on Friday start offering loans from a 2.5 billion rand ($135 million) Youth Fund aimed at supporting small businesses, part of a push by the government to tackle one of the world’s highest unemployment rates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯卢克石油公司同意向贡渥集团出售海外资产
item.description: 被制裁的俄罗斯石油生产商卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）已同意将其国际资产出售给能源贸易商贡渥集团（Gunvor Group）。【原文：Sanctioned Russian oil producer Lukoil PJSC has agreed to sell its international assets to energy trader Gunvor Group.】

item.title: 匈牙利第三季度经济停滞，欧尔班遭受打击
item.description: 匈牙利第三季度经济停滞不前，这是对总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）的挑战，他所在的政党在距离大选不到六个月的时间里落后于反对党。【原文：Hungary’s economy stagnated in the third quarter, in a challenge to Prime Minister Viktor Orban whose party trails the opposition less than six months from elections.】

item.title: 中国称将与美国合作解决 TikTok 问题
item.description: 中国政府承诺将与华盛顿合作解决 TikTok 美国业务的命运问题，但并未表示同意唐纳德-特朗普总统吹捧的分拆 ByteDance Ltd. 皇冠上的明珠的交易。【原文：Beijing pledged to work with Washington to resolve the fate of TikTok’s US business, stopping short of saying it’s agreed to a deal touted by President Donald Trump to spin off ByteDance Ltd.’s crown jewel.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "公司与英国 VMO2 公司合作开发移动 "非点 "项目
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链（Starlink）公司达成了第一份英国电信协议，将卫星连接直接带到客户的手机上。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink struck its first UK telecom deal to bring satellite connectivity directly to customers’ phones.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行增持阿尔法银行股份至 28 亿美元
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）将其在阿尔法银行（Alpha Bank SA）的持股增至约 29.5%，首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 加强了与这家希腊贷款机构的合作，同时表示他的目标不是全面收购。【原文：UniCredit SpA increased its holding in Alpha Bank SA to about 29.5%, as Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel boosts cooperation with the Greek lender while signaling he’s not aiming at a full takeover bid.】

item.title: 壳牌油气贸易复苏，利润超出预期
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）公布的第三季度利润超过了分析师的预期，这得益于其石油和天然气交易商业绩的反弹，尽管能源价格疲软对盈利造成了影响。【原文：Shell Plc posted third-quarter profit that beat analyst estimates, helped by a rebound in performance by its oil and gas traders even as weaker energy prices weighed on earnings.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数下跌，WPP 股价下挫
鲍威尔警告不要押注降息，比特币跌势扩大
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的鹰派言论打压了今年再次降息的预期后，比特币继续走低。【原文：Bitcoin continued to lose ground after hawkish remarks from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell dampened expectations for another interest-rate cut this year.】
